Key Match Events: Mexico scraped out a 1-0 victory over Jamaica in their Group B opener in the Copa America.
Gerardo Arteaga scored the only goal of the match in the 69th minute.
Mexico's captain Edson Alvarez suffered a potentially tournament-ending injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas, USA.
The attendance for the match was 53,763.
